name: Free Online SSL Certificate Checker - ATools
description: Free online SSL/HTTPS checker: Test site HTTPS reachability, response status codes, final URLs and response time (static site uses public proxy).
seoDescription: Free online SSL/HTTPS checker that tests HTTPS reachability, HTTP/HTTPS status codes, final redirect URLs and response times by simply entering a domain or URL. Since this tool is a pure static site, browsers cannot directly read certificate details, so this tool uses public proxies to obtain basic reachability information, suitable for quickly determining if a site supports HTTPS and whether there are redirect anomalies.

ui.title: SSL/TLS Certificate Checker
ui.inputPlaceholder: Enter domain or URL, e.g., example.com or https://example.com/path
ui.invalidInput: Please enter a valid domain or URL
ui.subject: Subject
